hudmanager.configuration.title: HUD Manager Configuration
hudmanager.configuration.Autosave_Indica: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays autosaving
hudmanager.configuration.Boss_Bar.toolti: Locates at the top of screen, displays health of boss mobs
Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays sounds in game
hudmanager.configuration.Crosshair.toolt: Locates in the middle of screen, displays the aim point
hudmanager.configuration.Debug_Screen.to: Displayed when F3 is pressed, displays various information
hudmanager.configuration.Hotbar_Group.to: Locates at the bottom of screen, displays various information
hudmanager.configuration.Player_List.too: Displayed while holding down Tab, displays player information
hudmanager.configuration.Scoreboard_Side: Locates on the right of screen, displays objective information
hudmanager.configuration.Screen_Title.to: Locates in the middle of screen, displays various texts
hudmanager.configuration.Status_Effect.t: Locates in the top right of screen, displays status effects
